content.text: Royal Signs & Awnings is your full-service Houston, TX sign company. We design, produce, and install high-quality custom signs for businesses of all sizes throughout the Houston metropolitan area.
From eye-catching storefront signs to professional indoor signage, our experienced team delivers exceptional results that help your business stand out and attract more customers.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for your Free Consultation!

Ready to boost your average ticket, increase your traffic flow, or improve your team's productivity? Royal Signs & Awnings delivers the high-visibility signage you must have to do precisely that. From the initial free signage consultation to final sign install, we see to it we are manufacturing the appropriate signs for your unique location, desires, and brand.
Our specialists make an effort to comprehend your unique promotional goals, which allows us to deliver practical sign and graphic alternatives that will perform for your specific needs.

We provide comprehensive signage solutions including outdoor signs, indoor signs, vehicle wraps, monument signs, channel letters, and much more. Whatever your signage needs, Royal Signs & Awnings has the expertise and equipment to deliver.
Our team works with you from concept to installation, ensuring your signs perfectly represent your brand and meet all local regulations.
Contact Royal Signs & Awnings today for a free consultation. We'll assess your signage needs and provide recommendations tailored to your business goals and budget.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings at (281) 645-9935 for your Free Consultation with a Sign Specialist!
